title: Analytical detection of the bioactive molecules dopamine, thyroxine, hydrogen peroxide, and glucose using CsPbBr3 perovskite nanocrystals
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,32648-32654
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA06576J, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Puthanveedu Divya, Kodompatta P. Arjunan, Maya Nair, John P. Rappai, Kulangara Sandeep
Qualitative and quantitative detection of biologically important molecules such as dopamine, thyroxine, hydrogen peroxide, and glucose, using CsPbBr3 nanocrystals coated paper/glass substrates are discussed.
